title: Retry build/deployment (no new feature changes requested)
constraints: Do not add new features beyond what is already specified in existing features; this request is only to retry the build/deployment after the prior configuration/build failure.

Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; create backend/migration.mo only if upgrading existing stable state requires it.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change website copy, layout, services, navigation, contact form behavior, or theme as part of this request.
Do not create or edit logo/hero images as part of this request unless required to fix a build error (e.g., missing asset path).
